name: 🔪Escape The Night🔪
description:
Escape the Night is a side-scroller endless runner game developed by me! Also my first game published on Itch.Io. 

Discover the secrets and story of a haunted knight trying to escape from a castle.

Trailer is in spanish, btw!

Hope you can enjoy it and leave a comment!

Controls: 

Jump - Spacebar

Attack - X

Parry - Z (unlockable level 3)

I took some assets from:

https://aamatniekss.itch.io/fantasy-knight-free-pixelart-animated-character

https://ansimuz.itch.io/gothicvania-patreon-collection

Also music from:

Prod. RΛVS

( If I forgot to mention you and didn't give you credits, please let me know so I can add you)
